title: So I just played against 9 boost bots in ARAM. Is this common?

replies.body: no norms you play against 5 and with 4
nah as in, people running a scripted bot, to level up an account
you can only play AGAINST 5 players not 9
he is saying 9 bots, use your brain and realize that he is saying his team were bots too xD
yes and he sed he vs 9 bots in 1 game "So I just played against 9 boost bots in ARAM" seeeeeee

the team of bots he is playing with are against him cause they just feed, which therefore gets the other bots fed which then makes it harder for him
seeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee
Well, it's a bot to level the account up to 30 and then be sold I'm presuming
ARAM at them levels are riddled with them, when i was doing my own smurf (before i stopped due to getting sick of it) you'd get 4 bots minimum.

I'm assuming this is in pre-30 games? If so, bots themselves are relatively common, usually you see at least 1 every 2 or 3 games (from my experience), but being matches with 9 bots in one game is rare (it's possible you got matched with "bot pre-mades").
